sn48.64:4.1: “Mendicants, when these five faculties are developed and cultivated they lead to the ending of defilements.
sn48.64:4.3: The faculties of faith, energy, mindfulness, samādhi, and wisdom.
sn48.64:4.5: When these five faculties are developed and cultivated they lead to the ending of defilements.”
sn48.64:5.1: “Mendicants, when these five faculties are developed and cultivated they lead to giving up the fetters, uprooting the tendencies, completely understanding the course of time, and ending the defilements.
sn48.64:5.3: The faculties of faith, energy, mindfulness, samādhi, and wisdom.
sn48.64:5.5: When these five faculties are developed and cultivated they lead to giving up the fetters, uprooting the tendencies, completely understanding the course of time, and ending the defilements.”
